about_the_game:
Red Horizon: Mars is a simplistic, yet strategic Mars colonization simulator, where you make decisions that impact humanities last hope. Set in the distant future, it is up to you to instate a government, promote laws, and manage your colony in Mars. Choose your destiny - do you succeed in turning Mars into a succesful, habitable planet? Do you turn Mars into a technological superpower? That is your choice to make when playing RHM.

Features include:

  • Multiple ideologies to take lead of your colony

  • A variety of decisions to make for the good of Mars

  • Laws you must enact and use to better your planet

  • Statistics such as planet happiness and crime

  • Terraform Mars, and turn it into the habitable planet suitable for humanity

  • And much much more!

Game is in very early stages, so updates will be frequent and you can expect lot's of graphical and gameplay changes to come soon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (4th gen) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (2.0 GHz or higher)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (6th gen) or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 (2.5 GHz or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 550
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio or equivalent
